attributes.action: Paines Lane / Uxbridge Road / Woodhall Drive Junction HA5
attributes.additional_details: On behalf of my local community, I urge you to reconsider the Paines Lane/Uxbridge Rd/Woodhall Drive junction. Too many accidents occuring unnecessarily. I have researched this and have the backing of a large amount of parents in the Pinner/Hatch End area. We request a mini roundabout on said junction and/or traffic warnings to reduce the speed of traffic on the Uxbridge Road junction

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
